inclusion.criterion: Clinical CE-MRI within the past 12 months (scheduled or completed)
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of cardiac arrest or spontaneous or inducible sustained VT (15 beats or more at a rate of 120 BPM or greater)*
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has history of CAD and prior MI, but also had recent cardiac arrest and spontaneous VT.
